page.title: 02Housing.
page.content: The area consists of the villages of Radyr,Morganstown,Tongwynlais,Whitchu rch and Rhiwbina.It is an area of high population with the villages serving as dormitory villages. Tongwynlais has 1691 inhabitants 383 are aged 15 or under,1036 from 16-65, 185 being O.A.P.They live in 629 homes 189 council owned,278 privately owned, 37 rented and 125 belong to a housing association.Castle View Estate, Morganstown has houses which vary in price from Â£24,000 to Â£85,000.45% are detached with on average 3-4 bedrooms. Each has roughly 1/10 of an acre plot. People in the area in 1985 looked for the following in houses:-central heating good sized bedrooms a bathroom and pleasant gardens.40% of the people interviewed liked Radyr because of proximity to work and it was a pleasant area._
